Package jAudioFeatureExtractor.Aggregators

Class Summary
Aggregator Aggregator is an interface for specifying the mechanism for collapsing frame-by-frame features into per-file data.
AggregatorContainer Container object that handles the creation of aggregators.
AreaMoments Area Method of Moments Aggregator
AreaPolynomialApproximation 2D Polynomial Approximation
DummyAgg DummyAgg
Mean Calculates the mean of a feature accross all windows where it is defined.
MFCC MFCC Aggregator MFCC Aggregator is a general aggregator that produces the fist 10 MFCCs of each feature dimension independently.
MultipleFeatureHistogram Multiple Fetaure Histogram
StandardDeviation Standard Deviation
